attributes.title: TORE APART MY FAMILY
attributes.review: after downloading this app i got multiple spam calls. i usually just hung up but finally i answered. the call stated that my husband was cheating on me!!! i confronted him but he said he got calls saying i cheated😱😱 i IMMEDIATLY filed for divorce and we were divorced for a few months. finally, months after the divorce was finalized, we got emails stating that this was all a masive prank from the TRUMP2020 campaign. now we have to try to explain this to our kids, family, and friends. youve ruined our lives. #DUMPTRUMP

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I wanted to support my Cheeto puff king🤩. So I downloaded it. And The first thing I see is an overcooked fat carrot calling me an illegal rapist😔🤚then I got scared 😱 cuz my phone started to have a seizure🤪 (I’m currently on my uncles 2nd cousins sons mailman’s past dogs left paw)😳 but all I want to say is other than all that I admire his non sense of knowledge 😍 one more thing🥵 I think he would look a lot better with a more classy wig. Cuz the one he was rn doesn’t match his suits too well😢also get rid of the fake tan☺️ and last and final delete yourself❤️

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date with things and the next time I opened it the screen went black and then an orange demonic symbol popped up. The app then started rapidly flashing colors and violently vibrating until an ungodly amount of Cheetos started spilling from my device. It has pushed me and my family out of our home and it has ruined our lives. We lost our youngest to the mountain of Cheetos where our neighborhood used to be. Please keep us in your thoughts praying 🙏🏼

attributes.title: THIS IS A PORN APP!!!!
attributes.review: This is awe full! Immediately when I went onto this app, a bunch of porn started playing! And for some reason, my camera and microphone were in use? I wasn’t even using the camera or microphone! It was awful because I was playing Country Roads on my Alexa, and then I opened this app. Mind this, my extended family was in the room. Then I opened this app while my music was still playing on my Alexa, and porn started playing! THE WHOLE FAMILY HEARD!!!! 🤬 I was so embarrassed! Never download this app!

attributes.title: Unhappy
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to hear whats going on in the political world of America but it’s not what I got. When I open the app, it freezes, exits the app, and I’m returned to my homepage. I’ve deleted and redownloaded this app several times but it keeps happening. I’ve checked sites like Reddit and Quora to see if others were having this issue and they are, but there is no fix!! I do not recommend this app and expect the developers to shut it down and work on a better version.

attributes.title: This app is terrible :(
attributes.review: Hello!!! He’s strong he’s passionate he’s smart he’s tough and uh he’s an adult and uh he’s smart he’s tough he’s strong he’s passionate and uh he’s smart he’s tough! But unlike him I downloaded the app hoping my dreams of seeing my favorite president, my role model and king portraying the amazing role he plays live and In action. Turns out my battery percentage dramatically drops and leaves me with a orange tint on my screen somewhat like his complexion like a nice orangish color and I would not recommend this. So yeah don’t buy it. Hello:/ ~ with love Melania

attributes.title: Not even worth the time
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded on the App Store and that says a lot with the amount of apps I had on my phone. I thought it’ll be a goof idea to get this app so I can keep up with the important information our president had to tell us about his campaign but I was truly disappointed when I got it and it started to glitch immediately after downloading it deleted it 4 times and reinstalled it for it to still not work. Very unsatisfied

attributes.title: They knew I was Mexican
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and was SOOOO excited because I ADORE Cheetos. But as soon as I opened the app, the loading screen was a brick wall. And then it turned into a mini game called “Deportation”. I thought it was weird so I called up my white friend who downloaded it and they said that all you have to do is win the game and they send you a white cap and a long piece of rope as a reward. But when I played it, all I received was a plane ticket to Mexico. Where is my rope, Donnie? I was really excited to fix my ceiling fan.

attributes.title: HORRIFIC
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app I got multiple texts from spams and people saying they were gonna drop kick me !!?! So scary, AND the fbi started flying over my house with helicopters and swarming it. And that’s not even the worse part, I literally died immediately, but thankfully my family was home and they gave me CPR 🙌🏻. Then after that a dinosaur actually drop kicked me, threw a fish at my face and told me I was a c*nt😖. I don’t know how this app is still up PLEASE take it down, NO ONE should have to go through what I went threw 😣.

attributes.title: Okurrrrrrrrr
attributes.review: I opened the app and was faced with a Chetto puff he then proceeded to CHASE MEEE!! I had to kid a demonic attic and they saved me from the Chetto but unfortunately they were mexican and the Chetto FOUND US we were all sent to the Atlantic that’s when I woke up and realized it was a nightmare but then BEYONCÉ CAN TO MY HOUSE and then told me to be quite to make a long story short this app didn’t proved watermelon Nd I was severely disappointed especially since I was promised toothless the dragon and I am now depressed cause this app lied so 🧚🏽‍♀️✨1000 PERCENT DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! One starrr forrr yoooo 🧚🏽‍♀️✨🙅🏽‍♀️
